description: Lemon Flan. Vegan Flan Recipe. No Bake No Egg No agar Custard flan with caramelized coconut sugar. Spanish Custard flan or Creme Caramel. Vegan gluten-free Soy-free Oil-free Recipe. Makes 2-3 ramekins. I used two 3.5 inch ramekins.
name: Lemon Flan. Vegan Flan Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup cashews (soaked for 15 mins or longer)
1 tbsp chickpea flour (1/2 tsp more for more set)
1/2 tsp starch (cornstarch or arowroot (1/2 tsp more for more set)
2 tbsp sugar or sweetener of choice
a good pinch of kala namak (Indian sulphur salt for eggy flavor or use nutritional yeast)
add some lemon zest for more lemony custard

recipeInstructions.text: Heat all the ingredients in a skillet over medium heat. Mix continuously in the beginning until the sugar mixes in. Use powdered sugar for even caramel if needed. Once the sugar is boiling and bubbly, pour into ramekins. Move the ramekins around to spread the caramel all over the bottom quickly as the caramel will harden.
